then.sendRequestSIP: ACK [contfork[lastCall-ID]([index])] SIP/2.0 To: [lastTo] From: [lastFrom] Call-ID: [lastCall-ID] [proxfork[lastCall-ID]([index])] [Via] Cseq: [lastCseqNumber] ACK Content-Length: 0
ACK [URI[lastCall-ID]] SIP/2.0 To: [lastTo] From: [lastFrom] Call-ID: [lastCall-ID] [Via] [ROUTE[lastCall-ID]] Cseq: [lastCseqNumber] ACK Content-Length: 0

else.sendRequestSIP: ACK [URI[lastCall-ID]] SIP/2.0 To: [lastTo] From: [lastFrom] Call-ID: [lastCall-ID] [Via] Cseq: [lastCseqNumber] ACK Content-Length: 0
